channel.title: Server online
channel.description: [b]Okay guys, first of all, thanks for looking at my thread. Secondly I want you to know i am not knew to hosting servers. I recently moved and got a comcast modem and i've been so frustrated lately. I really would like to host my server but the ports are being very annoying. would anyone be able to teamview/skype. Thanks guys.[/b]
